Name: Stil Vampir
Effect: [AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your main phase, [Soul-Charge] 1, and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.[ACT](VC/RC):[Soul-Blast 8 & Counter-Blast 5] Choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and put that unit on your opponent's (VC), and at the beginning of the end phase of that turn, your opponent chooses a card from his or her soul, and rides it.
Flavor: Know your limits! Black Downfall!

Name: Demon World Marquis, Amon
Effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +1000 for each &ltDark Irregulars> in your soul.[ACT](VC):[Counter-Blast 1 & Choose one of your &ltDark Irregulars> rear-guards, and put it into your soul] Your opponent chooses one of his or her rear-guards, and retires it.
Flavor: I'll show you what real power is like! Inferno Ritual!

Name: Nightmare Doll, Alice
Effect: [AUTO](RC):[Counter-Blast 1 & Put this unit into your soul] When this unit's attack hits, if you have a <Pale Moon> vanguard, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a <Pale Moon> other than a card named "Nightmare Doll, Alice" from your soul, and call it to (RC).
Flavor: A bad dream you'll never wake from! That's the Endless Nightmare!

Name: Ravenous Dragon, Gigarex
Effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):During your turn, when another of your &ltTachikaze> rear-guards is put into the drop zone, this unit gets [Power] +1000 until end of turn.
Flavor: Penetrate! Pierce! Needle Explosion!

Name: Swordsman of the Explosive Flames, Palamedes
Effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit attacks, if the number of grade 3 &ltRoyal Paladin> vanguards and/or rear-guards you have is two or more, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle.
Flavor: When heroes rally, the battlefield will be engulfed in flames!

Name: Goddess of the Full Moon, Tsukuyomi
Effect: [CONT](VC/RC):If you do not have a card named "Goddess of the Half Moon, Tsukuyomi", a card named "Goddess of the Crescent Moon, Tsukuyomi", and a card named "Godhawk, Ichibyoshi" in your soul, this unit gets [Power] -2000.[ACT](VC):[Counter-Blast 2] If the number of &ltOracle Think Tank> in your soul is six or more, draw two cards, choose a card from your hand, and put it into your soul.
Flavor: Calm the lost souls of darkness, and guide them to heaven! Moon Shadow Magatama!

Name: Goddess of the Half Moon, Tsukuyomi
Effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), if you have a card named "Goddess of the Crescent Moon, Tsukuyomi" and a card named "Godhawk, Ichibyoshi" in your soul, you may [Soul-Charge] 2.[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your ride phase, look at five cards from the top of your deck, search for up to one card named "Goddess of the Full Moon, Tsukuyomi" from among them, ride it, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If you rode, you cannot normal ride during that ride phase.
Flavor: Close your eyes, and feel the light glowing deep within your heart. That is the light of hope.

Name: Ultimate Lifeform, Cosmo Lord
Effect: [ACT](VC):[Choose one of your &ltNova Grappler> rear-guards, and [Rest] it] This unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn.
Flavor: The universe shall fuel my strength! Cosmo Drain!!

Name: Edel Rose
Effect: [ACT](VC):[Counter-Blast 2] If you have a card named "Werwolf Sieger" in your soul, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.[ACT](Hand):[Reveal this card to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck] Search your deck for up to one card named "Werwolf Sieger", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
Flavor: Now, color me red! Scarlet Tear!

Name: Gwynn the Ripper
Effect: [AUTO]:[Counter-Blast 2] When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), if you have a &ltDark Irregulars> vanguard, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's grade 2 or less rear-guards, and retire it.
Flavor: Had enough? I'll let you rest in peace.

Name: March Rabbit of Nightmareland
Effect: [AUTO]:[Choose a &ltDark Irregulars> from your hand, and discard it] When this unit is placed on (GC), you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your &ltDark Irregulars> that is being attacked, and that unit cannot be hit until end of that battle.
Flavor: Oh no, you can't do that. It's unacceptable to disturb the tea party.

Name: Doreen the Thruster
Effect: [AUTO](RC):During your main phase, when a card is put into your soul, if you have a &ltDark Irregulars> vanguard, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of turn.
Flavor: A ha ha ha ha, I've grown tired of you. You may disappear.

Name: Dusk Illusionist, Robert
Effect: [AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your main phase, [Soul-Charge] 1, look at the top card of your deck, and put that card on the top or the bottom of your deck.[ACT](VC/RC):[Soul-Blast 8 & Counter-Blast 5] Put all of your opponent's grade 1 or less rear-guards into his or her soul.
Flavor: Come forth from the twilight! Hellgate Illusion!

Name: Crimson Beast Tamer
Effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you have a card named "Crimson Beast Tamer" in your soul, this unit gets [Power] +3000.
Flavor: ...time to unleash the whip of flames.

Name: Mirror Demon
Effect: [AUTO](RC):[Counter-Blast 1 & Put this unit into your soul] When this unit's attack hits, if you have a <Pale Moon> vanguard, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a <Pale Moon> other than a card named "Mirror Demon" from your soul, and call it to (RC).

Name: Hades Hypnotist
Effect: [AUTO]:[Choose a <Pale Moon> from your hand, and discard it] When this unit is placed on (GC), you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your <Pale Moon> that is being attacked, and that unit cannot be hit until end of that battle.

Name: Archbird
Effect: [AUTO]:[Choose a &ltTachikaze> from your hand, and discard it] When this unit is placed on (GC), you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your &ltTachikaze> that is being attacked, and that unit cannot be hit until end of that battle.

Name: Imprisoned Fallen Angel, Saraqael

Name: Werwolf Sieger
Flavor: Through repeated use of forbidden magic and demonic transformations, they possess unusual powers even among demons. They are the Dark Irregulars.

Name: Demon of Aspiration, Amon
Effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if the number of &ltDark Irregulars> in your soul is six or more, this unit gets [Power] +3000.

Name: Vermillion Gatekeeper
Effect: [AUTO](VC):When another &ltDark Irregulars> rides this unit, you may [Soul-Charge] 1.

Effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), if you have a <Pale Moon> vanguard, you may [Soul-Charge] 1.

Name: Drangal
